title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - REVISED
description: Revise the requirements for the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool, including potential data sources (e.g., project management tools, task logs), analysis methods (e.g., machine learning algorithms, statistical analysis), output formats (e.g., visualizations, reports), and consider edge cases such as holidays, vacations, or employee departures/arrivals. Also, define the interface for users to opt-in and customize their preferences.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, data storage (considering scalable solutions like cloud services), security considerations (including data encryption and access controls), and scalability strategies. The design should also consider potential future integrations with other systems.

title: Design Data Collection and Storage
description: Design the data collection and storage mechanisms for capturing work patterns and task assignments. The design should consider data privacy, security, and compliance with relevant regulations, including GDPR and HIPAA if applicable. It should also address scalability, performance, and data retention policies, and employ encryption methods to secure sensitive data. Additionally, the design should be flexible to accommodate potential future expansions and changes in workflows.

title: Design Analysis and Reporting (Revised)
description: Revise the design of the analysis algorithms and reporting mechanisms for identifying potential overwork or uneven task distribution. The revised design should consider factors such as task duration, complexity, deadlines, employee workload capacity, and task priorities. The revised reporting mechanism should provide clear visualizations, actionable insights, and prioritized suggestions to help managers and employees balance workloads effectively. Additionally, consider integrating the system with existing project management tools for seamless data flow.

title: Design User Interface - Revised
description: Revise the user interface design for configuring the tool, viewing reports, and managing opt-in settings. Include clear instructions, intuitive navigation, and accessible design principles. Integrate with the project's Design System where applicable.

title: Plan Security and Privacy Measures
description: Develop a plan for ensuring data privacy and security, including access controls and data encryption.

title: Plan Deployment and Operations
description: Develop a comprehensive plan for deploying and operating the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool, including infrastructure requirements, monitoring and logging strategies, maintenance schedules, disaster recovery procedures, and a clear handoff process to ensure smooth transition between development, testing, and production environments.

title: Create Test Plan (Revised)
description: Develop a comprehensive and detailed test plan for validating the functionality, performance, and security of the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool. The plan should include test cases, expected results, test environment setup, and any necessary prerequisites.

title: Develop Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the WorkloadBalanceAnalyzer tool. The documentation should cover installation, configuration, usage scenarios, troubleshooting, and API references (if applicable). Ensure that the documentation is well-structured, easy to understand, and up-to-date with the latest features and changes.
